newsitem.title: BOSNIA: French soldier killed by falling tree in Bosnia.
newsitem.headline: French soldier killed by falling tree in Bosnia.

text.p: A French soldier serving with the NATO-led peace force in Bosnia died on Monday when a tree fell on his vehicle, a statement released by the peace implementation force (IFOR) said.
Chief Warrant Officer Francis Dumant, serving with the 403rd Chaumont artillery regiment, was travelling in a vehicle when he was killed by a tree being felled by a local man, the statement said.
The accident happened about 40 km (25 miles) south of Sarajevo in the village of Oblaj.
